author: amaltaro
body:
Superseeds https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/7493

Besides having all the changes required for the Go implementation of DBSReader (including aggregation and data streaming), it also has url redirect enabled in RestClient.
title: Update dbs3-client to 4.0.4 and dbs3-client-pycurl to 3.17.7
